20110124171658.000|20110124171700.000|TR0|Sensitive government memos being leaked 
20110124171700.000|20110124171703.000|TR0|online.  And no, we're not talking about 
20110124171703.000|20110124171705.000|TR0|the latest WikiLeaks dump.  This time, the 
20110124171705.000|20110124171708.000|TR0|leak is coming from the Middle Eastern 
20110124171708.000|20110124171710.000|TR0|news network Al Jazeera.  Dubbed "The 
20110124171710.000|20110124171713.000|TR0|Palestine Papers," the memos allegedly 
20110124171713.000|20110124171715.000|TR0|document details of Middle East peace 
20110124171715.000|20110124171718.000|TR0|talks from 2008, peace talks mediated by

20110124171725.000|20110124171728.000|TR0|chief, has the story.
20110124171728.000|20110124171730.000|TR0|
20110124171730.000|20110124171732.000|TR0|KEVIN FLOWER, CNN JERUSALEM BUREAU CHIEF:  
20110124171732.000|20110124171735.000|TR0|Hi, Carol.
20110124171735.000|20110124171737.000|TR0|
20110124171737.000|20110124171740.000|TR0|Well, those papers released by the Al 
20110124171740.000|20110124171742.000|TR0|Jazeera network, what they tell us is it 
20110124171742.000|20110124171745.000|TR0|gives us details, intimate details, of the 
20110124171745.000|20110124171747.000|TR0|negotiations, as you mentioned, between 
20110124171747.000|20110124171750.000|TR0|Israel and Palestinians for the last 10 
20110124171750.000|20110124171752.000|TR0|years.  And some of these revelations have 
20110124171752.000|20110124171755.000|TR0|startled a lot of Palestinians, 
20110124171755.000|20110124171757.000|TR0|specifically revelations that the 
20110124171757.000|20110124171800.000|TR0|Palestinian negotiators, that the 
20110124171800.000|20110124171802.000|TR0|Palestinian Authority was willing to 
20110124171802.000|20110124171805.000|TR0|relinquish claims to all -- large swaths 
20110124171805.000|20110124171807.000|TR0|of east Jerusalem.
20110124171807.000|20110124171809.000|TR0|
20110124171809.000|20110124171812.000|TR0|And that is important to Palestinians, 
20110124171812.000|20110124171814.000|TR0|because east Jerusalem, they hold the site 
20110124171814.000|20110124171817.000|TR0|for the future capital of their state.  
20110124171817.000|20110124171819.000|TR0|The status -- the future status with 
20110124171819.000|20110124171822.000|TR0|Jerusalem here is a very, very sensitive 
20110124171822.000|20110124171824.000|TR0|issue.  So any compromises on the future 
20110124171824.000|20110124171827.000|TR0|deal with Jerusalem are watched very 
20110124171827.000|20110124171829.000|TR0|closely here.
20110124171829.000|20110124171832.000|TR0|
20110124171832.000|20110124171834.000|TR0|And so, essentially, what you had was the 
20110124171834.000|20110124171837.000|TR0|Palestinian Authority taking one position 
20110124171837.000|20110124171839.000|TR0|privately in negotiations, which is to say 
20110124171839.000|20110124171842.000|TR0|we will relinquish our claims on these, 
20110124171842.000|20110124171844.000|TR0|and saying something very differently 
20110124171844.000|20110124171846.000|TR0|publicly to its Palestinian populous, 
20110124171846.000|20110124171849.000|TR0|which is, we will never give up on east 
20110124171849.000|20110124171851.000|TR0|Jerusalem, we will not let Israeli 
20110124171851.000|20110124171854.000|TR0|construction continue there.  We won't 
20110124171854.000|20110124171856.000|TR0|accept that.
20110124171856.000|20110124171859.000|TR0|
20110124171859.000|20110124171901.000|TR0|So, basically, this has put the 
20110124171901.000|20110124171904.000|TR0|Palestinian Authority in a bit of a 
20110124171904.000|20110124171906.000|TR0|political bind as it faces criticism from

20110124171909.000|20110124171911.000|TR0|the Palestinian Authority to bring about

20110124172201.000|20110124172204.000|TR0|COSTELLO:  Taking a look at our top 
20110124172204.000|20110124172206.000|TR0|stories.     At least 35 people have been 
20110124172206.000|20110124172209.000|TR0|killed in what appears to be a terrorist 
20110124172209.000|20110124172211.000|TR0|attack at Moscow's busiest airport.  An 
20110124172211.000|20110124172214.000|TR0|emergency official says more than 150 
20110124172214.000|20110124172216.000|TR0|others were injured.  Russian state TV 
20110124172216.000|20110124172219.000|TR0|says a suicide bomber carried out the 
20110124172219.000|20110124172221.000|TR0|attack.

20110124172955.000|20110124172957.000|TR0|Many politicians say that the 
20110124172957.000|20110124173000.000|TR0|transportation infrastructure must be 
20110124173000.000|20110124173002.000|TR0|improved, the way that we move our planes 
20110124173002.000|20110124173005.000|TR0|and our trains and our boats and our 
20110124173005.000|20110124173007.000|TR0|buses.  And yet, based on a comprehensive

20110124173017.000|20110124173020.000|TR0|of our infrastructure remains terribly 
20110124173020.000|20110124173022.000|TR0|weak.
20110124173022.000|20110124173025.000|TR0|

20110124173030.000|20110124173032.000|TR0| Based on an industry study just last 
20110124173032.000|20110124173035.000|TR0|year, the amount of air travel, domestic 
20110124173035.000|20110124173037.000|TR0|air travel, moved up seven percent. And 
20110124173037.000|20110124173039.000|TR0|yet, the Society says an overhaul of the

20110124173151.000|20110124173153.000|TR0|transit by 25 percent over the past 20 
20110124173153.000|20110124173156.000|TR0|years.  That's faster than any other way

20110124173320.000|20110124173322.000|TR0|FOREMAN:  Sixty year.  Sixty years, 
20110124173322.000|20110124173325.000|TR0|though!  Look, they are made to last 50 
20110124173325.000|20110124173327.000|TR0|years old, and on average, they are 60 
20110124173327.000|20110124173330.000|TR0|years old.  So put it simply, we are a 
20110124173330.000|20110124173332.000|TR0|growing country, and these systems are
